CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Eightco Holdings Inc. is engaged in the business of Forever 8 inventory cash flow solution, Web3 Business, and Packaging Business. Its subsidiary, Forever 8 Fund, LLC (Forever 8) is an e-commerce fintech company that provides funding solutions for e-commerce businesses. Its Packaging Business manufactures and sells custom packaging for a wide variety of products. Packaging Business provides packaging for third-party customers in a variety of industries, including pharmaceutical and e-commerce companies. The Company operates through two segments: Inventory Management Solutions segment and the Corrugated segment.
